entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
